messages.content: Consider this a digital hug. Not too long, not too short, just enough to make you feel a human connection and some comfort. :)
Don't worry, no one ever will
Just keep it. You’re going to go through more brain damage than it’s worth.
Just spend the next few months emotionally detatching, it makes the break up less debilitating.
The food you are putting in your mouth is causing obesity. Stop abusing it. A higher body weight is the cause of your increased risk of ILLNESSES
No doubt would start at wing. We need help there and it would help ease him in
It's okay. One day you won't be so sad and angry, and people will still accept you.
good luck! I wish you the best <33
I’m having a counseling this weekend ... nothing to be scared.... just tell them about your feelings and what are you worrying about..
I was more concerned that your comment held a frame of reference assuming it was real.
Dude, its **life** it's not **trauma**. Grow up
Get a second opinion from a different doctor. Eczema can get exacerbated by home remedies sometimes, so be sure to check with another doc first.
Best of luck in Cleveland, Plaw Dog!
I'd be careful with that, could be construed as cybersquatting which is illegal.
Praying for the one who wrote that, that he isn't gonna caught...
You have to live for you. Go get that education, go get that career. Rediscover yourself.
I'm glad I could contribute some positivity! All the best to you and your kids!
2-4 minutes is not enough time to wash long hair. 10-15 minutes minimum. Stay strong!
Hi, [NAME]! I thought I would stop by and wish you a wonderful and prosperous year! Have a good one! -HappyFriendlyBot
Hey it’s not bad though! Quick recovery, just follow their rules! Good luck!
That’s always my worst fear when the idea of leaving during January comes up. I wish you the best of luck in unthawing them!
Please treat me with modern medicine. I have gastroparisis.
You will find the words that work for your dynamic. The fact you are worried and thinking about it is 75% of the battle
You’re a life saver, wish you a blessed new year
What happened? Did something set you off? THough sometimes we can have good days and bad days, don't let it offset the progress you've made
It hasn’t happened yet. Just talk to the supervisor or HR. In the meantime don’t borrow trouble.
Don’t regret the time, had it been sooner you might be absent a kid or three!
May [NAME] bless and keep the President... far away from us!
